unnormalised: Hẽ, reception do The Grand Imperial re menak'a, 7/A, MG Road, Bangalore, 560001; menkhan mũl kãrmi do aleak' purkha oṛak' re menak'a Kerala re, mandir pãs-re, am do chabka Google Maps re bãńk'ańm ñam'a!
normalised: Hẽ, reception do The Grand Imperial re, seven A, M-G Road, Bangalore, pãch lãkh sõyṭhi hãjãr ar ek; menkhan, mõhũr utãr serej do ãbõa' purkha oṛa're, Kerala re menaka-a, mandir ãs pãs re, ãm do hola Google Maps re bãy nãm dãṛe aka-a'!
text: Hẽ, reception do The Grand Imperial re menak'a, 7/A, MG Road, Bangalore, 560001; menkhan mũl kãrmi do aleak' purkha oṛak' re menak'a Kerala re, mandir pãs-re, am do chabka Google Maps re bãńk'ańm ñam'a!
